description: Welcome to this 3-level townhouse in the desirable Saunders/Broadmoor neighbourhood! Featuring a bright and spacious main floor with 9' ceilings and an open-concept layout, this home offers great flow and comfort for everyday living. Generously sized bedrooms provide plenty of space for the whole family. Enjoy the convenience of a bedrooom on the lower floor to single garage parking with ample storage. Centrally located in Richmond with easy access to shopping, restaurants, and transit. School catchment: Lee Elementary and McRoberts Secondary.
